Name: SALVATIONLAND
About the game: An alternate future after a global flood. A young wasteland traveller named Victor went to northern mountains in searching of 'city of dreams' from old times. Having reached a human settlement, he realizes that he's trapped - it's impossible to escape back from this place. Moreover, the city turns out to be divided into two parts: ordinary people live in the first, and the second, in which the 'chosen ones' live, is surrounded by a large fence. The desire to find his place in the cradle of surviving mankind turns into a series of dizzying events for him, during which he'll have to unravel the secret plans of the mad city mayor and become a local hero... Unique post-flood setting and original atmosphere, The author's story and interesting quests, uncovered the game world with different directions, Increased difficulty of the gameplay, Elements of a survival sim and fishing mechanics, Spacious locations in the middle of the waters and mountains, available for exploration, The mysterious but omnipresent main villain and the ending of the story that tears off all the veils.
